welcome_message_body: Welcome to Alcobendas, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Horno San Lorenzo
restaurants.description: Horno San Lorenzo is a bakery located in Alcobendas.
restaurants.address: Calle de Valgrande, 16, 28108 Alcobendas Comunidad de Madrid

restaurants.name: El Mercado de Alcobendas
restaurants.description: El Mercado de Alcobendas is a deli located in the city.

restaurants.name: La Maquina de La Moraleja
restaurants.description: La Maquina de La Moraleja is a seafood restaurant located in Alcobendas.
restaurants.address: Pl. de la Moraleja, s/n, 28109 Alcobendas Comunidad de Madrid

restaurants.name: La Penela
restaurants.description: La Penela is a spanish restaurant located in Alcobendas.
restaurants.address: Plaza del la Moraleja (Plaza de la Fuente Calle Estafeta nº2), 28109 Alcobendas Comunidad de Madrid

restaurants.name: Tierra de Barros
restaurants.description: Tierra de Barros is a spanish restaurant located in Alcobendas.
restaurants.address: Calle de Dolores Ibárruri, 21 (Dolores Ibarruri), 28100 Alcobendas Comunidad de Madrid
